```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(spotifyr)
LP <- get_playlist_audio_features("", "37i9dQZF1DWVi45nh2EuPP")

LP <-
  bind_rows(
    LP %>% mutate(category = "League of legends"),
  )



LP %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = category, y = acousticness)) +
  geom_violin()

LP %>% ggplot(aes(x = valence, y = energy, color=loudness)) + geom_jitter() + geom_smooth()

LP %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = energy)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 0.1, fill="white",color="black") +
  facet_wrap(~category)

```
